actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to allow each veteran with an updated discharge to receive full educational benefits without regard to the date of the veteran's initial discharge from service.

summary.text: Permits veterans with an upgraded discharge to receive full educational benefits without regard to the date of the veteran's initial discharge from service.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to allow each veteran with an updated discharge to receive full educational benefits without regard to the date of the veteran's initial discharge from service.
